alert.note: Alert for Chase; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 7:04PM CDT until April 19 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CHASE AND SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 704 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florence, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marion, Peabody, Cottonwood Falls, Strong City, Florence, Elmdale, Cedar Point and Tallgrass Prairie Preserve. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
